import React,{useState} from 'react'; import "../Style/Login.css" import {Container,Row,Col,Form,FormGroup,Button} from 'reactstrap' import {Link} from "react-router-dom" import loginImg from '../assets/images/login.png' import UserIcon from '../assets/images/user.png' const Login = () => { const [credentials,setCredentials]=useState({ email:undefined, password:undefined }) const handleChange=e=>{ setCredentials(prev=>({...prev,[e.target.id]:e.target.value})) } const handleClick=e=>{ e.preventDefault() } return (

Login

); } export default Login;
